get.description: Retrieve a list of salt_cache items filtered by bank and key with pagination support.

get.description: Pings the server to see if it is alive.

count.description: Total number of items that match the query

next.description: URL to the next page of results

num_pages.description: Total number of pages that match the query

per_page.description: Total number of items per page that match the query

previous.description: URL to the previous page of results

Bearer.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
Bearer.name: Authorization
